item.title: 2016-10-11 18:00 Infinum JS Talks #1
item.description:
Lo and behold - the first ever Infinum JavaScript talks! We are starting with a bang! First talk is by Darko, a JavaScript Team lead at Infinum who loves working on the cutting edge of new technologies. As you would expect, his talk is about features that don't yet exist in the browser. Luka Skukan, on the other hand, is our resident JavaScript overengineer. He'll be talking about patterns and standards that you probably don't even need, but might find useful.
We have cookies (muffins).
item.content:encoded:
<style>*{white-space:pre;}</style>Lo and behold - the first ever Infinum JavaScript talks! We are starting with a bang! First talk is by Darko, a JavaScript Team lead at Infinum who loves working on the cutting edge of new technologies. As you would expect, his talk is about features that don't yet exist in the browser. Luka Skukan, on the other hand, is our resident JavaScript overengineer. He'll be talking about patterns and standards that you probably don't even need, but might find useful.
We have cookies (muffins).

item.title: 2016-10-23 09:00 C# Coding for women
item.description: Coding for women tečaj će osigurati polaznicama upoznavanje s osnovama objektno orijentiranog programiranja, osnovama programiranja u C#-u te izradom jednostavnih konzolnih aplikacija.
item.content:encoded: <style>*{white-space:pre;}</style>Coding for women tečaj će osigurati polaznicama upoznavanje s osnovama objektno orijentiranog programiranja, osnovama programiranja u C#-u te izradom jednostavnih konzolnih aplikacija.

item.title: 2016-10-30 10:00 JavaScript-Zagreb | Serverless Code Camp Zagreb
item.description:
WebCamp Zagreb 2016 conference weekend is a great opportunity for us to host a super-special JavaScript event - a workshop which will explore one of the hottest things in the world of software development, AWS lambda serverless infrastructure.
This workshop will guide you through programming for the cloud. You'll learn how to create cloud functions to manage virtual tanks. At the end of the day, there will be a tournament where we'll all engage our virtual tanks in a series of battles, while we'll grab some pizza'n'beer and watch the show.
item.content:encoded:
<style>*{white-space:pre;}</style>WebCamp Zagreb 2016 conference weekend is a great opportunity for us to host a super-special JavaScript event - a workshop which will explore one of the hottest things in the world of software development, AWS lambda serverless infrastructure.
This workshop will guide you through programming for the cloud. You'll learn how to create cloud functions to manage virtual tanks. At the end of the day, there will be a tournament where we'll all engage our virtual tanks in a series of battles, while we'll grab some pizza'n'beer and watch the show.

item.title: 2016-11-17 17:30 ZgPHP meetup #63
item.description: A monthly meetup of PHP developer enthusiasts from Zagreb and region. We started in 2011, now there around 200 members, and we welcome all new members! We have organized sessions & drinkups after throught whole year, except summers when we do only drinkups.
item.content:encoded: <style>*{white-space:pre;}</style>A monthly meetup of PHP developer enthusiasts from Zagreb and region. We started in 2011, now there around 200 members, and we welcome all new members! We have organized sessions & drinkups after throught whole year, except summers when we do only drinkups.
